welcome_message_body: Welcome to the charming city of Padova, known for its beautiful historic architecture, vibrant street life, and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this wonderful city has to offer. Buon viaggio!

restaurants.name: Dalla Zita
restaurants.description: Dalla Zita is a sandwich spot located in Padova.

restaurants.name: All'Ombra Della Piazza
restaurants.description: All'Ombra Della Piazza is a café located in Padova.

restaurants.name: Pizzeria Al Duomo
restaurants.description: Pizzeria Al Duomo is a pizzeria located in Padova.
restaurants.address: Via San Gregorio Barbarigo 18 (Via San Gregorio Barbarigo, 18), 35141 Padova Veneto

restaurants.name: Caffè Pedrocchi
restaurants.description: Caffè Pedrocchi is a café located in Padova.

restaurants.name: Osteria l'Anfora
restaurants.description: Osteria l'Anfora is a italian restaurant located in Padova.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Trissino Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Trissino Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Marco Polo Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used by low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Limited to 2 hours of free access per device.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at S. Angelo Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
